title: Ep 5: Advice. Instagram is not Real Life, Moving to a New City, The "Shame" of Bad Books.. + B&G Can't Stop Buying Shoes.
itunes:title: Ep 5: Advice. Instagram is not Real Life, Moving to a New City, The Shame of Bad Books, Becca & Grace Can't Stop Buying Shoes.
description:
It's Advice Day! Today, Grace & Becca answer a range of your questions - from not comparing yourself to others, to getting over the "shame" of reading bad books, making more time to read, moving to a new city, and more!

During the ep, G&B also discuss the fact that they can't stop buying shoes (Becca: M. Gemi; Grace: Loeffler Randall). Meanwhile, Grace has deleted all her dating apps and Becca can't stop following seltzer accounts on Instagram.

Join us next week for our next book club to discuss The Thousandth Floor by Katharine McGee.

In the meantime, loving Bad on Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast

And leave us a review in iTunes!
